articles.title: Gulf in class - UAE hands Malaysia a real nightmare - The Star Online
articles.description: PETALING JAYA: It was not the best of starts for Harimau Malaya in the World Cup 2022-Asian Cup 2023 second-round qualifiers after they were thrashed 0-4 by the United Arab Emirates at the Zabeel Stadium in Dubai on Friday.

articles.title: Asian Qualifiers:Asian Qualifiers - Group E: Qatar see off India to stay in firm control - The Official Home of Asian Football
articles.description: Doha: Qatar stretched their lead in Group E of the Asian Qualifiers for the FIFA World Cup Qatar 2022 and AFC Asian Cup China 2023, after defeating India 1-0 at the Jassim Bin Hamad Stadium on Thursday.
